name: terpsichorean
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to dancing: There is a current television craze for dance contests featuring celebrities not known for their terpsichorean talents.
More examplesFewer examplesEnjoy a variety of terpsichorean events in this week-long celebration of dance organised by Arts Council England. Enthusiastic pupils are being put through their terpsichorean paces on a two-day jazz-age dance course at the Burgh Island Hotel.This affinity between the visual and terpsichorean arts has enabled Sadler's Wells theatre to create an ambitious foyer art programme.Last season his uninhibited Terpsichorean direction more than once knocked stands over and sent scores flying, leaving his players to scramble for their music.
